meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.1
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.1, including Vert.x HTTP proxy, RxJava 3, Open Telemetry, and more.

meta.title: Migrate from Vert.x 3 to Vert.x 4
meta.summary: We provide a clear and well-documented migration path from Vert.x 3.9 to Vert.x 4. Existing users will feel at home with the new version.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.4 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.4 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.0.Beta1 released!
meta.summary:
The first beta of the upcoming Vert.x 4.2 has just been released. We
  consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.
